articles.title: Harvard prof said ocean balls were alien tech, may just be industrial waste - Business Insider
articles.description: Controversial Harvard Professor Avi Loeb ruffled feathers after claiming metal spherules at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean were alien tech. Now, there's another theory.
articles.content:
A Harvard professor's claims that metallic balls discovered under the ocean may have been made by aliens have been called into question yet again.
